data.message: ISRAEL is suffering this every year and NOBODY cares. I hope you now understand what is going on here!!!!

essam open google maps and see what is israel...
Even google can't find israel........ #LongLivePALESTINE we are with you......

Jews and others do themselves no favors by objecting to and belittling people who show empathy and concern for the victims in Paris.
May of the situations of people in Israel do merit sympathy and concern but criticizing those showing sympathy for Parisians is not the way to inspire it.

If somebody said "I am in favor of supporting research to find a cure for childhood cancers" you wouldn't say to them "You b*stard, why don't you support finding a cure for childhood diabetes instead? Do you want children with cancer to be cured but not children with diabetes?" would you?

And by the way many American and European citizens have been working and continue to work to help relieve the suffering of innocent victims of violence in Israel.
This is what Israel deserves every minute long as you abide in fire of hell :D
